mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_user_minfo(r_iseq,r_uid, r_icount, r_sdate, r_edate) VALUES(#{r_iseq}, #{us_uid}, #{r_icount}, #{r_sdate}, #{r_edate} )
mapper.select: SELECT count(*) FROM tbl_user_minfo LEFT JOIN tbl_user ON u_id = r_uid LEFT JOIN tbl_user_comp ON u_id = us_uid WHERE us_ccode = #{ccode} AND r_iseq = #{seq}
select sum(i_price) as total_price from tbl_user_minfo join tbl_minfo on r_iseq = i_seq WHERE i_ccode = #{ccode}
SELECT SUM(i_price) AS total_price FROM tbl_user_minfo JOIN tbl_minfo ON r_iseq = i_seq where r_sdate between '2024-05-01' and '2024-05-31' and i_ccode = #{ccode}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM tbl_user_minfo WHERE r_uid = #{id} AND r_iseq=#{seq}
